{"id":715226626,"lang":"cpp","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1654461284,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/715226626/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        if(x==INT_MAX||x==INT_MIN)return 0;\n        int sign=(x<0);\n        if(sign)x*=-1;\n        unsigned int num=0;\n        int cnt=0,last=0;\n        while(x){\n            num=(num*10)+x%10;if(cnt==0)last=x%10;x/=10;cnt++;\n        }\n        unsigned ans=num;\n        if(sign){\n            ans*=-1;\n            if(num-1>INT_MAX||(cnt>9&&last>2))ans=0;\n        }\n        else{\n            if(num>INT_MAX||((cnt>9&&last>2)))ans=0;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer"}
